extendedInfo.description: Juego de naipes dondetendrÃ¡s que realizar jugadas que sumen 15 puntos(bazas) y obtener el mayor nÃºmero posible de puntos.Juega para ser el primero en obtener 21 puntos y ser el campeÃ³n de la escoba.

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: I love learning a new, good game. I like that it its an authentic local game. I like the GUI, clean and simple. I wish it was available without ads. Also, I can only play when I\'m alone because of the sounds. Good sound effects but not appropriate when I play in public.  To the rater who said it cheats. I first ever played this game here, and I often win. And I usually get far more points than ten. Anyway why would someone program a phone game to cheat?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unbalanced game
reviews.comment: I lived in Argentina for a year and played Escoba 3 or 4 days a week.  I\'m not the best player in the world, but I\'m certainly not the worst either.  I could routinely score between 10 and 21 points playing in real life, depending on my hand dealt, the skill of my opponent, if we were paying attention or not, etc.  I\'ve played 85 games on this app already and scored higher than 10 ONE time; most of the time I earn less than 5.  Even if you account for a computer\'s consistent logic that would let it earn points each time it is available vs a human maybe missing points that he could possibly take, I\'m forced to believe that the computer has some unfair advantage when cards are dealt. Something is wrong in the programming to favor them.  It sucks because the GUI is, as others said, clean and simple.
reviews.author: A Google User
